strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Checks status of each job in Hudson
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT: Hudson Status Gadget Copyright (c) 2008 Jeff Black
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2008 Jeff Black. All Rights Reserved
strings.OPTIONS_HEADER: Please fill all the fields with valid data.
strings.URL_LABEL: Enter a Hudson URL, http://server[:port]/. This can be the main dashboard URL or any view URL.
strings.NETWORK_FAILURE: Error fetching hudson status from server, please check your network connection and try again.
